title: You're Doing Great! 🌬️
body: Hey, developer here: It may sound cheesy, but I'm really proud of you, whoever you are. Take a moment for your emotions. Our tools are here if you need them.

title: Daily Reminder 🌟
body: Here is your daily reminder to take care of your emotions. Could one of our tools prove helpful right now?

title: Pause and Breathe 🌬️
body: Hey! Feeling the need to slow down for a few minutes? A calming breathing exercise could be just what you need.

title: Time for Self-Reflection? 🪞
body: Hey! Could it be a good idea to open your mood journal and take a moment to connect with how you’re feeling today?

title: Check In with Your Emotions 📝
body: Hey! Settle into your scheduled time with a breathing exercise or journaling session.

title: Slow Down for a Moment? 🌸
body: Hey! Use this moment to explore a tool that suits you—breathe, reflect, or challenge your thoughts.

title: Check In with Your Emotions 📝
body: Hey! It's your daily check-in reminder. Meditate on your emotions and build insight.

title: Mindful Moments Await 🌿
body: Hey! Dive into an activity that helps you center yourself—breathing, journaling, or CBT. Your body and mind will be grateful.

title: Breathe In, Breathe Out 🌬️
body: Hey! Want to take a moment to relax with a guided breathing exercise? Feel the calm flow through you.

title: Small Steps, Big Changes ✨
body: Hey! It’s a great time to check in with yourself. You may choose a tool that will nurture your mind and emotions.
